Uses of Class
org.apache.datasketches.memory.WritableBuffer

    • Uses of WritableBuffer in org.apache.datasketches.memory

      Methods in org.apache.datasketches.memory that return WritableBuffer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract WritableBuffer WritableMemory.asWritableBuffer()
      Returns a new WritableBuffer with a writable view of this object.
      abstract WritableBuffer WritableMemory.asWritableBuffer(ByteOrder byteOrder)
      Returns a new WritableBuffer with a writable view of this object with the given byte order.
      static WritableBuffer WritableBuffer.wrap(ByteBuffer byteBuf)
      Accesses the given ByteBuffer for write operations.
      static WritableBuffer WritableBuffer.wrap(ByteBuffer byteBuf, ByteOrder byteOrder)
      Accesses the given ByteBuffer for write operations.
      abstract WritableBuffer WritableBuffer.writableDuplicate()
      Returns a duplicate writable view of this Buffer with the same but independent values of start, position and end.
      abstract WritableBuffer WritableBuffer.writableDuplicate(ByteOrder byteOrder)
      Returns a duplicate writable view of this Buffer with the same but independent values of start, position and end, but with the specified byteOrder.
      abstract WritableBuffer WritableBuffer.writableRegion()
      A writable region is a writable view of this object.
      abstract WritableBuffer WritableBuffer.writableRegion(long offsetBytes, long capacityBytes, ByteOrder byteOrder)
      A writable region is a writable view of this object.
